about_the_game:
Play as a lonely Lunar Rover whose job is to prepare the moon for habitation. There has been a recent crash of a space shuttle and with man's arrival on the horizon it's time to explore and use the available resources to ensure their safe arrival.

Roving Rovers started as a replica of the internationally recognised Australian Rover Challenge, enabling players to understand the complexities of the lunar and otherworldly rover missions. Developed with the support of The Andy Thomas Centre for Space Resources, University of Adelaide and Flinders university, it is based in the realities of the space industry.

Features:
  • Rover customisation
  • First and Third person views
  • Drive across an imported scan of the moon
